about_the_game:
Did you go out to sea today.

Everyone has a dream of sailing in their hearts, but due to geographical reasons, time constraints, economic reasons, and so on, it has been abandoned.

Here are bays suitable for sailing competitions from all over the world, come and enjoy the fun of sailing to the fullest.

The operation of sailboats in the game is not so complicated. Just control the rudder with your left hand and the sail with your right hand to flexibly control the sailboat and enjoy the pleasure of riding the wind and waves.

Here, you can participate in sailing competitions along a fixed route, or embark on treasure hunting adventures at will. The wind direction is different every time, which can bring more fun and freshness.

Highlights

■13 real bay maps from around the world to choose from

■You can choose between competition mode and treasure hunting mode

■There are simple mode and expert mode to choose from

■There are two operating habits to choose from: switching forward or reverse

■Each scene has 8 wind directions to choose from

■There are 10 randomly occurring weather conditions

■There are 50 patterns and 5 colors of sails that can be purchased with points

■Realistic ocean wave effects

■A fully physics based sailing experience

■Each competition route will go through stages of downwind, headwind, and crosswind

■According to the 9 levels that have been upgraded based on the voyage, there are 9 levels waiting for you to challenge

■Every game will match different opponents

name: VR Sailing

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: WINDOWS® 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (32/64-BIT)
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590, AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or better
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR or Oculus PC. Room Scale 2m by 1.5m area required
  • Additional Notes: HDMI 1.4, DisplayPort 1.2 or newer
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: WINDOWS® 10 (32/64-BIT)
  • Processor: Intel i7-4770 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 980 equivalent
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR or Oculus PC. Room Scale 2m by 1.5m area required
  • Additional Notes: HDMI 1.4, DisplayPort 1.2 or newer

short_description: It allows players to transform into sailboat navigators, sailing their beloved ships in the endless sea and enjoying the thrill of 360 degree immersive sailing and waves! Feel the forward momentum brought by the wind.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Portugal, Korean
